channel.title: Whonix Failed to start Encrypted Swap File Creator
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
When I start whonix it fails to start encrypted Swap File Creator both in the Gateway and the Workstation...
![Sans%20titre|690x388](upload://xH39Sil6mVuu4FA7D3YdAVP4Lk5.png)
I have haveged installed, and this problem persist on every reboot.
Any idea on what to do ? Is it a big problem and should I stop running Whonix until it's fixed ?
Thanks :slight_smile:
